TEXT: Choose a card to exhaust from your deck.

When you play a #ySkill, move toward the left of the meter. NL When you play an #yAttack, move toward the right of the meter. NL When you reach one of the end of the meter, enter the corresponding #ystances. NL At the end of every turn return to the center. NL You can hover this to see info on the #ystances.
